name: Turtle VR
description:
Turtle VR brings the Logo turtle into the 21st century. Use an interface similar to MIT Scratch, and Google Blockly, to program a turtle to draw your creations within various 3D worlds.



Using a tablet style interface, combined with Google’s Blockly, you are able to drive a programmable turtle in real-time while in VR. Draw and explore geometry using the code blocks Turtle VR provides, and browse through the provided catalog of programs.



Block-based programming makes it easy for anyone to get started.
